[00:00.00]Wait Wait Wait - 蔡徐坤 (KUN)
[00:01.61]词：蔡徐坤
[00:03.22]曲：蔡徐坤
[00:04.84]和声编写：蔡徐坤
[00:06.45]和声：蔡徐坤
[00:08.07]制作人：蔡徐坤
[00:09.68]Wait Wait Wait
[00:11.47]All I do is wait wait wait
[00:13.66]You're the one I'm waiting for
[00:18.48]Weight weight weight
[00:20.25]Carrying the weight weight weight
[00:22.17]Is better than to let you go
[00:27.55]This space, our place
[00:29.70]This room is never gonna feel the same
[00:36.28]Up late, Too late
[00:38.45]To say I shoulda done it differently
[00:44.52]I hate that I miss you
[00:45.69]I'd stop if I could
[00:48.06]All our nights, Were spent in ecstasy
[00:53.25]So I can't forget you
[00:54.46]As much as I should
[00:56.81]All my days… I miss you next to me
[01:02.12]Wait Wait Wait
[01:03.65]All I do is wait wait wait
[01:05.88]You're the one I'm waiting for
[01:10.83]Weight weight weight
[01:12.45]Carrying the weight weight weight
[01:14.62]Is better than to let you go
[01:19.87]Two feet, One dance
[01:22.08]Distance, The devil walked in between
[01:28.62]Woke up, Broke down
[01:30.78]Oh how'd you'd ever do that to me
[01:36.90]I hate that I miss you
[01:38.05]I'd stop if I could
[01:40.55]All our nights, Were spent in ecstasy
[01:45.55]So I can't forget you
[01:46.67]As much as I should
[01:49.18]All my days… I miss you next to me
[01:54.52]Wait Wait Wait
[01:55.99]All I do is wait wait wait
[01:58.21]You're the one I'm waiting for
[02:03.14]Weight weight weight
[02:04.84]Carrying the weight weight weight
[02:07.04]Is better than to let you go
[02:11.91]Wait Wait Wait
[02:13.59]All I do is wait wait wait
[02:15.73]You're the one I'm waiting for
[02:20.66]Weight weight weight
[02:22.22]Carrying the weight weight weight
[02:24.45]Is better than to let you go
[02:29.45]Love, This love
[02:31.26]Is killin me to carry the weight of
[02:34.56]Us, This love
[02:35.77]Is killin me to carry the weight of
[02:38.82]Us, This love
[02:40.03]Is killin me, But it's better than to let you go
[02:46.89]Love, This love
[02:48.81]Is killin me to carry the weight of
[02:51.99]Us, This love
[02:53.09]Is killin me to carry the weight of
[02:56.26]Us, This love
[02:57.51]Is killin me, But it's better than to let you go
[03:16.86]Is better than to let you go
[03:19.54]Wait Wait Wait…

[ti:Wait Wait Wait]

[al:Wait Wait Wait]

[00:09.68]等等等
[00:11.47]我能做的只是不断等待
[00:13.66]而你就是我等待的那个人
[00:18.48]沉重重量
[00:20.25]比起让你离开
[00:22.17]我愿意承载这沉重的重量
[00:27.55]这空间 我们的曾经
[00:29.70]这个房间永远不再有当初的感觉
[00:36.28]又熬夜 又失眠
[00:38.45]我妄想改变这一切
[00:44.52]开始讨厌不停止的想念你
[00:45.69]如果可以我只想停止想你
[00:48.06]曾经的夜晚我们在欢笑声中相依
[00:53.25]用尽力气
[00:54.46]我还是无法忘记你
[00:56.81]所有的日子 我好想念依靠在我身旁的你
[01:02.12]等等等
